analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#97-102)

WhiteListCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#291-314) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,bonusTokensForReferred) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#300-302)
	-token.mint(referrals[_beneficiary],bonusTokensForReferral) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#302-303)
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,bonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#311-312)

DemeterCrowdsale.issueCompanyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#749-785) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(DEV_WALLET,devTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#764-766)
	-token.mint(BIZDEV_WALLET,bizDevTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#772-773)
	-token.mint(RELEASE_WALLET,releaseTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#783-784)

WhiteListCrowdsale.addWhiteListedInvestor (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#318-331) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= whiteListRegistrationEndTime) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#321-322)

WhiteListCrowdsale.validWhiteListedPurchase (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#400-404) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isWhiteListed[_investor] || isReferred(_investor) || block.timestamp > whiteListEndTime (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#402-404)

WhiteListCrowdsale.computeBonusTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#412-435) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > whiteListEndTime (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#428-431)

DemeterCrowdsale.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#795-799) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- DemeterToken(token).unlockTime() > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#796-799)

TimeLockedToken.setUnlockTime (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#992-997) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_unlockTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8eb17dfa4ec9a6457e4c8fb3d724c0ed9ba4cf0.sol#996-997)
